collected_data.core_idea: An AI-powered meeting assistant that automatically takes notes, identifies action items, and follows up with participants
collected_data.target_customer: Remote teams at mid-sized tech companies (50-500 employees) using Zoom/Teams
collected_data.value_proposition: Unlike generic note-taking apps, we integrate directly with video platforms and use AI to understand context, automatically assign tasks to the right people
collected_data.timeline: MVP in 3 months, first paying customers in 6 months

step_1_refinement.summary: All required fields collected with high quality
